channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on MAMADOU OURY LY
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on MAMADOU OURY LY

item.title: Project 3: Banknote Classifier
item.description: Created a tool that predicts whether or not a banknote is authentic. Performed EDA to understand the data using Python libraries. Handled outliers and scaled the features. Applied cross_validate techniques to 9 machine-learning algorithms reach the best model. Optimized the selected algorithm using GridSearchCV. Dockerized the model using Docker container. Built a client facing API using Flask, Kubernetes and GCP cloud. The project’s Github Repository DISCLAIMER ‚ö†Ô∏è This project is a POC(Proof of concept).

item.title: Project 2: Scrapper
item.description: Created a tool that scraps information about a product from Flipkart website. Wrote a Python code to connect to MongoDb Atlas database. An alternative was MySQL server. Scrapped the data using Python code and store it into MongoDb. Built a client facing API using Flask and Heroku cloud. This is the project’s Github Repository MOTIVATION üí™ Web scrapping is one of the most famous strategy in data collection from the internet.

item.title: Project 1: Diabetes Classifier
item.description: Created a tool that predicts whether or not a patient has Diabetes. Performed EDA to understand the data using Python libraries. Handled outliers, imbalanced data Set and scaled the features. Applied cross_validate techniques to 9 machine-learning algorithms reach the best model. Optimized the selected algorithm using RandomizedSearchCV. Built a client facing API using Flask. The project’s Github Repository DISCLAIMER ‚ö†Ô∏è This project is a POC(Proof of concept). It is an End-to-End project to present the idea that how we can use ML into precision diabetes if developped at large scale with enough data.
